resources.string:
You can now copy to or paste from clipboard using the following commands in adb shell:
 
 1. 启动app adb shell am start -n ca.zgrs.clipper/.Main 2. 设置剪切板内容 adb shell am broadcast -n ca.zgrs.clipper/.ClipperReceiver -a clipper.set -e text "测试文本" 
 3. 获取剪切板内容 adb shell am broadcast -n ca.zgrs.clipper/.ClipperReceiver -a clipper.get
